param.name: private_key
param.label: reCaptcha private key
param.description: The private key you obtained from reCapctha when subscribing to their service.

param.name: public_key
param.label: reCaptcha public key
param.description: The public key you obtained from reCapctha when subscribing to their service.

param.name: showHelpBtn
param.label: Show help button
param.description: If yes, a button to access help will be displayed with captcha

param.name: showAudioBtn
param.label: Show audio button
param.description: If yes, a button to have chanllenge be played out as sound will be displayed

param.name: theme
param.label: Use theme
param.description: Force usage of a specific reCaptcha theme

param.name: lang
param.label: Use language
param.description: Force usage of a specific language

param.name: use_ssl
param.label: Use ssl
param.description: If yes, reCaptcha server will be accessed using ssl (ie: using https)
